title: Chapter 1479 - No Intention Of Intervening
body:
Chapter 1479 - No Intention Of Intervening

There was an enormous disparity in numbers between the two sides.

One had six people, including that man and woman who saw Su Yi and Zhao Liancheng as prey.

The other party only had two people, and both of them were already badly injured and covered in blood.

By the time Su Yi and Zhao Liancheng saw them from a distance, the smaller group was already losing, and soon, both of them were captured. A middle-aged man in black Daoist robes took out a jade bottle and placed both captives inside.

“Brother Luo Yun, Brother Chang He!!” Zhao Liancheng shouted, his hair and beard bristling with anger. He was visibly frantic.

The two who’d been suppressed were his companions!

“Don’t panic. They aren’t dead,” Su Yi said casually. He could tell that they’d been taken alive and that they weren’t currently in any danger.

“Haha, two more targets have come looking for us!” The white-haired elder laughed.

“It seems these two are with the prey we captured earlier,” said the man in jade-colored robes, his eyes flashing with murderous intent.

“I wouldn’t have thought they’d be stupid enough to cast themselves into the net,” said the woman in green. She shook her head.

“Since you’ve already...
